meanings.sent1: She waved adioses to her friends as the train departed.
meanings.sent2: The adioses at the airport were filled with tears and hugs.
meanings.sent3: The adioses between the old tree and the falling leaves were bittersweet.
meanings.sent4: The adioses whispered by the wind carried the promise of reunion.
meanings.sent5: The adioses echoed in the empty room, marking the end of an era.

meanings.definition: Used to express good wishes when parting.
meanings.sent1: Adioses! Have a safe journey back home.
meanings.sent2: Adioses, my friend. See you soon!
meanings.sent3: Adioses, may your path be filled with sunshine and laughter.
meanings.sent4: Adioses rang out in the night, carrying hopes for tomorrow.
meanings.sent5: Adioses were exchanged under the starlit sky, a silent promise of friendship.
